name: Olympian Heights
description:
Olympian Heights is a Top-down 3rd-person view Platformer with RPG elements. It is inspired by Mario 64 where one can collect currency for upgrades or find secrets throughout the game. Enemies can be defeated in multiple ways depending on their weaknesses or immunities meaning that jump-to-defeat is not always possible.

At the current state you can move around the first stage and reach the goal. More will be added soon

Controls: WASD for movement and Space for jump

Shift for sprinting
